CustomBehavior.Text: I am in Eastern Kingdoms. I need to be in Kalimdor. Making my way to Maraudon.
You started the bot with me inside Maraudon. Running out to reset the dungeon.
Waiting for the dungeon to load.
I have detected that my gear is about to break. I'm going to hearth, repair and then return to the instance.
Succesfully hearthed, moving to the repair vendor.
